about_the_game: The nightmares are upon us. Decent into a dark chapter of the world of Grip on Reality with the new character, the Nightmare Stalker. A quick assassin using the power of nightmares and the void to slay his enemies. Unleash a flurry of knives to throw at your foes, beat your enemies to a pulp with your shadowy tentacles and build up your characters special ability, the endless night. Become darkness itself as your glide across the world destroying all those who stand in your way. The Nightmare Stalker comes with its own arsenal of new powerful items that will change how you play and that will test your sanity and prowess as they bring you deeper into the nightmare realm.
